name: Grapply (itch)
description:
GRAPPLY

A Parkour Titled Game, which is the submission of XGJam. This was made in 1 week, and is missing a lot of features I intended to add. This is a 3 Level Game all based in different Environments.

I might make this a Full Released Game. but who knows 👀.

CONTROLS

F - Slow Mo

Left Click - Grapple

CREDITS

Game Art: Rayan Aziz

3D Models:  Rayan Aziz

Programming:  Rayan Aziz

Direction:  Rayan Aziz

Game Design:  Rayan Aziz

Music: YouTube Non-Copyrighted LOL
